Domains: CREATE DOMAIN D_ID AS INTEGER NOT NULL;
CREATE DOMAIN D_LAST_NAME AS VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL;
CREATE DOMAIN D_NAME AS VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL;
CREATE DOMAIN D_PHONE_NUMBER AS VARCHAR(9) NOT NULL;
Procedures:
BEGIN
    INSERT INTO CLIENTS (ID, NAME, LAST_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER)
    VALUES (:P_ID, :P_NAME, :P_LAST_NAME, :P_PHONE_NUMBER);
END

BEGIN
    INSERT INTO PRODUCTS (ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION)
    VALUES (:P_ID, :P_NAME, :P_DESC);
END
